verses.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.english: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Saukar da Littãfin daga Allah ne, Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.english: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ Mun saukar da Littãfi zuwa gare ka, da gaskiya. Sabõda haka, ka bauta wa Allah kanã mai tsarkake addini a gare Shi.

verses.arabic: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
verses.english: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.
verses.hausa: To, addini tsarkakakke na Allah ne, kuma waɗanda suka riƙi waɗansu majibinta, bã Shi ba, (sunã cẽwa) "Ba mu bauta musu ba fãce dõmin su kusantar da mu zuwa ga Allah, kusantar daraja." Lalle Allah nã yin hukunci a tsakãninsu ga abin da suka zama sunã sãɓãwa a cikinsa. Lalle Allah ba Ya shiryar da wanda yake mai ƙarya, mai kãfirci.

verses.arabic: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.english: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
verses.hausa: Dã Allah Yã yi nufin Ya riƙi ɗã, to, lalle sai Ya zãɓa daga abin da Yake halittãwa abin da Yake so. Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Shi. Shĩ ne Allah, Makaɗaici, Mai tĩlastãwa.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
verses.english: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
verses.hausa: Ya halitta sammai da ƙasã da gaskiya. Yanã shigar da dare a kan rãna, kuma Yanã shigar da rãnã a kan dare kuma Yã hõre rãnã da watã, kõwannensu yanã gudãna zuwa ga ajali ambatacce. To, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai gãfara.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
verses.english: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?
verses.hausa: Yã halitta ku daga rai guda, sa'an nan Ya sanya ma'auranta daga gare shi. Kuma ya saukar muku daga dabbõbin gida nau'i takwas Yanã halitta ku a cikin cikunnan uwayenku, halitta a bãyan wata halitta, a cikin duffai uku. Wannan shĩ ne Allah Ubangijinku. Mulki a gare shi yake. Bãbu abin bautãwa fãce Shi. To, yãya ake karkatar da ku?

verses.arabic: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.english: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
verses.hausa: Idan kun kãfirta to, lalle Allah Wadãtacce ne daga barinku, kuma bã Shi yarda da kãfirci ga bãyinSa, kuma idan kun gõde, Zai yarda da ita (gõdiyar) a gare ku, kuma wani rai mai ɗaukar nauyi, bã ya ɗaukar nauyin wani. Sa'an nan kuma makõmarku zuwa ga Ubangijinku take, dõmin Ya bã ku lãbãri game da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa. Lalle Shĩ, Masani ne ga abin da yake a ainihin zukata.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.english: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan wata cũta ta shãfi mutum, sai ya kira Ubangijinsa, yanã mai mai da al'amari zuwa gare Shi, sa'an nan idan Ya jũyar da cũtar da ni'ima ta daga gare Shi, sai ya manta da abin da ya kasance yanã kira zuwa gare shi a gabãnin haka, kuma ya sanya wa Allah waɗansu abõkan tarẽwa dõmin ya ɓatar (da su) daga hanyarSa. Ka ce (masa), "Ka ji dãɗi da kãfircinka, a ɗan lõkaci, lalle kai daga 'yan wutã ne."

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.english: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.
verses.hausa: Shin, wanda yake mai tawãli'u sã'õ'in dare, yanã mai sujada kuma yanã mai tsayi ga salla, yanã tsõron Lãhira, kuma yanã fãtan rahamar Ubangijinsa, (yanã daidai da waninsa?) Ka ce: "Ashe, waɗanda suka sani, sunã daidaita da waɗanda ba su sani ba?" Mãsu hankali kawai ke yin tunãni.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.english: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: (Allah Ya ce): "Yã bãyĩNa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Ku bi Ubangijinku da taƙawa. Waɗanda suka kyautata a cikin wannan dũniya sunã da sakamako mai kyau, kuma ƙasar Allah mai fãɗi ce. Mãsu haƙuri kawai ake cika wa ijãrarsu, bã da wani lissãfi ba.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle nĩ, an umurce ni da in bauta wa Allah, inã tsarkake addini a gare Shi.

verses.arabic: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
verses.hausa: "Kuma an umurce ni da in kasance farkon mãsu miƙa wuya (ga umurnin Allah)."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle nĩ inã tsõro, idan na sãɓã wa Ubangijĩna, ga azãbar yini mai girma."

verses.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
verses.english: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Allah nake bautã wa, inã mai tsarkake addinĩna a gare Shi.

verses.arabic: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."
verses.hausa: "To, ku bauta wa abin da kuke so, waninSa." Ka ce: "Lalle mãsu hasãra, sũ ne waɗanda suka yi hasarar rãyukansu da iyãlansu, a Rãnar ¡iyãma. To, waccan fa, ita ce hasãra bayyananna."

verses.arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.english: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.
verses.hausa: Sunã da waɗansu inuwõwi na wutã daga samansu, kuma daga ƙasansu akwai waɗansu inuwõwi. Wancan Shĩ ne Allah ke tsõratar da bãyinSa da shi. Yã bãyĩNa! To, ku bĩ Ni da taƙawa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
verses.english: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka nĩsanci Shaiɗannu ga bauta musu, kuma suka mai da al'amari ga Allah, sunã da bushãra. To, ka bãyar da bushãra ga bãyiNa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.english: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda ke sauraren magana, sa'an nan su bi mafi kyaunta. waɗancan sũ ne Allah Ya shiryar da su, kuma waɗancan su ne mãsu hankali,

verses.arabic: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.english: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?
verses.hausa: Shin fa, wanda kalmar azãba ta wajaba a kansa? Shin fa, kanã iya tsãmar da wanda ke a cikin wutã?

verses.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
verses.english: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
verses.hausa: Amma waɗanda suka bi Ubangijinsu da taƙawa, sunã da bẽnãye, daga samansu akwai waɗansu bẽnãye ginannu, ƙoramu na gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu. Alkawarin Allah. Allah bã Ya sãɓã wa alkawarinSa.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.english: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.
verses.hausa: Shin, ba ka gani ba cẽwa lalle Allah Yã saukar da ruwa daga sama, sa'an nan Yã gudãnar da shi yanã marẽmari a cikin ƙasã sa'an nan Yã fitar da shũka game da shi, launukan shũkar mãsu sãɓãnin jũna sa'annan shũkar ta ƙeƙashe har ka gan ta fatsifatsi, sa'an nan Allah Ya sanya ta dandaƙaƙƙiya? Lalle ne ga wancan akwai tunãtarwa ga mãsu hankali (ga iyãwar gudãnar da ruwa a cikin gidãjen Aljanna).

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error.
verses.hausa: Shin fa, wanda Allah Ya buɗa ƙirjinsa, dõmin Musulunci sa'an nan shi yanã a kan haske daga Ubangijinsa, (zai zama kamar waninsa)? To, bone yã tabbata ga maƙeƙasa zukãtansu daga ambaton Allah. Waɗancan sunã a cikin wata ɓata bayyananna.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
verses.english: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
verses.hausa: Allah Ya sassaukar da mafi kyaun lãbãri, Littãfi mai kama da jũna, wanda ake konkoma karãtunsa fãtun waɗanda ke tsõron Ubangijinsu, sunã tãƙura sabõda Shi, sa'an nan fãtunsu da zukãtansu su yi laushi zuwa ga ambaton Allah. Waccan ita ce shiryarwar Allah, Yanã shiryar da wanda Ya so game da ita. Kuma wanda Allah Ya ɓatar, to, bã shi da wani mai shiryarwa.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
verses.english: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."
verses.hausa: Shin fa, wanda ke kãre mũguwar azãba da fuskarsa (yanã zama kamar waninsa) a Rãnar ƙiyãma? Kuma a ce wa azzãlumai, "Ku ɗanɗani abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda ke a gabãninsu, sun ƙaryata, sai azãba ta jẽ musu daga inda ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
verses.hausa: Sai Allah Ya ɗanɗana musu azãbar wulãkanci a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, kuma lalle azãbar Lãhira ita ce mafi girma, dã sun kasance sunã da sani.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun buga wa mutãne a, cikin wannan Alƙur'ãni, daga kõwane misãli, ɗammãninsu su yi tunãni.

verses.arabic: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: [It is] an Arabic Qur'an, without any deviance that they might become righteous.
verses.hausa: Abin karantãwa ne na Lãrabci, ba mai wata karkata ba, ɗammãninsu, su yi taƙawa.

verses.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! But most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: Allah Yã buga misãli; wani mutum (bãwa) a cikinsa akwai mãsu tarayya, mãsu mũgun hãlin jãyayya, da wani mutum (bãwa) dukansa ga wani mutum. Shin, zã su daidaita ga misãli? Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah (a kan bayãni). Ã'a, mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.
verses.hausa: Lalle kai mai mutuwa ne, kuma su mã lalle mãsu mutuwa ne.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.english: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, lalle kũ, a Rãnar ¡iyãma, a wurin Ubangijinku, zã ku yi ta yin husũma.

verses.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?
verses.hausa: To, wãne ne mafi zãlunci daga wanda ya yi ƙarya ga Allah, kuma ya ƙaryata gaskiya a lõkacin da ta jẽ masa? Shin bãbu mazauni a cikin Jahannama ga kãfirai?

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
verses.english: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya zo da gaskiya, kuma ya gaskata a game da ita, waɗancan sũ ne mãsu taƙawa.

verses.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -
verses.hausa: Sunã da abin da suke so wajen Ubangijinsu. Wancan shĩ ne sakamakon mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.arabic: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Dõmin Allah Ya kankare musu mafi mũnin abin da suka aikata, kuma Ya sãkã musu ijãrarsu da mafi kyaun abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
verses.english: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
verses.hausa: Ashe Allah bai zama Mai isa ga BãwanSa ba? Kuma sunã tsõratar da kai ga waɗanda suke waninSa, kuma wanda Allah Ya ɓatar to, bã, shi da mai shiryarwa.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ
verses.english: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda Allah Ya shiryar, to, bã shi da mai ɓatarwa. Ashe, Allah bai zama Mabuwãyi ba, Mai azãbar rãmuwa?

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
verses.english: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle idan ka tambaye su: "Wane ne ya halitta sammai da ƙasã?" Haƙĩƙa, zã su ce, "Allah ne." Ka ce: "Ashe, to, kun gani abin da kuke kira, waɗanda suke wanin Allah ne, idan Allah Ya nufe ni da wata cũta, shin sũ abũbuwan nan mãsu kuranye, cutarsa ne? Kõ kuma Ya nufe ni da wata rahama, shin, su abũbuwan nan mãsu kãme rahamarSa ne?" Ka ce: "Mai isata Allah ne, gare Shi mãsu tawakkali ke dõgara."

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Yã mutãnena! Ku yi aiki a kan hãlinku, lalle nĩ, inã aiki a kan hãlĩna. Sa'an nan zã ku sani."

verses.arabic: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
verses.english: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."
verses.hausa: "Wanda azãba ta je masa, zã ta wulãkanta shi, kuma wata azãba mai dawwama za ta sauka a kansa."

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for [the benefit of] his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ Mun saukar da littãfi a gare ka dõmin mutãne da gaskiya. Sa'an nan wanda ya nẽmi shiriya, to, dõmin kansa, kuma wanda ya ɓace, to, yanã ɓacẽwa ne a kanta. Kuma ba ka zama wakĩli a kansu ba.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
verses.hausa: Allah ne ke karɓar rãyuka a lõkacin mutuwarsu, da waɗannan da ba su mutu ba, a cikin barcinsu. Sa'an nan Ya riƙe wanda Ya hukunta mutuwa a kansa kuma Ya saki gudar, har zuwa ga ajali ambatacce. Lalle a cikin wancan, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda ke yin tunãni.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess [power over] anything, nor do they reason?"
verses.hausa: Kõ kuma sun riƙi mãsu cẽto ne, waɗansun Allah? Ka ce: "Shin, kuma kõ dã sun kasance bã su da mallakar kõme, kuma bã su hankalta?"

verses.arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Cẽto gabã ɗaya ga Allah yake. Mulkin sammai da ƙasã Nãsa ne. Sa'an nan zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku."

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
verses.english: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those [worshipped] other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan aka ambaci Allah Shi kaɗai zukãtan waɗanda ba su yi ĩmãni ba da Lãhira, su yi ƙiyãma, kuma idan an ambaci waɗanda suke kiran, wasunSa, sai gãsu sunã yin bushãrar farin ciki.

verses.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.english: Say, "O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ya Allah, Mai ƙãga halittar sammai da ƙasã, Masanin gaibi da bayyane! Kai ne ke yin hukunci a tsakãnin bãyinKa a cikin abin da suka kasance sunã sãɓa wa jũna a cikinsa."

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
verses.english: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã waɗanda suka yi zãlunci sunã da abin da ke cikin ƙasã gaba ɗaya, da misãlinsa a tãre da shi lalle dã sun yi fansa da shi daga mummunar azãba, a Rãnar ¡iyãma. Kuma abin da ba su kasance sunã zato ba, daga Allah, ya bayyana a gare su.

verses.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: Mũnãnan ayyuka da suka aikata, suka bayyana a gare su, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã yi, na izgili, ya wajaba a kansu.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: To, idan wata cũta ta shãfi mutum, sai ya kirãye Mu, sa'an nan idan Muka canza masa ita, ya sãmi ni'ima daga gare Mu, sai ya ce: "An bã ni ita ne a kan wani ilmi nãwa kawai." Ã'a ita wannan (magana) fitina ce, kuma amma mafi yawansu ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.english: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
verses.hausa: Lalle waɗanda ke a gabãninsu, sun faɗe ta, sabõda haka abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa bai wadãtar da su da kõme ba.

verses.arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
verses.english: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.
verses.hausa: Sai (sakamakon) mũnãnan abin da suka aikata ya same su. Kuma waɗanda suka yi zãlunci daga waɗannan, (sakamakon) munãnan abin da suka aikata zai sãme su, kuma ba su zama mabuwãya ba.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
verses.hausa: Ashe kuma ba su sani ba cẽwa Allah, na shimfiɗa arziƙi ga wanda Yake so, kuma Yanã ƙuƙuntawa? Lalle a cikin wancan akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda ke yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: (Allah Ya ce): "Yã bãyĩNa waɗanda suka yi barna a kan rãyukansu! Kada ku yanke ƙauna daga rahamar Allah. Lalle Allah na gãfarta zunubai gabã ɗaya. Lalle Shĩ, Shĩ ne Mai gãfara, Mai jin ƙai."

verses.arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku mayar da al'amari zuwa ga Ubangijinku, kuma ku sallama Masa, a gabãnin azãba ta zo muku, sa'an nan kuwa bã zã a taimake ku ba."

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku bi mafi kyaun abin da aka saukar zuwa gare ku daga Ubangijinku, a gabãnin azãba ta zo muku, bisa auke, kuma kũ ba ku sani ba."

verses.arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
verses.english: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."
verses.hausa: "Kada wani rai ya ce: 'Yã nadãmãta a kan abin da na yi sakaci a cikin sãshen Allah' kuma lalle na kasance, haƙĩƙa, daga mãsu izgili!"'

verses.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
verses.hausa: "Ko kuma (kada) ya ce: 'Da Allah Ya shiryar da ni, dã na kasance daga mãsu taƙawa.'"

verses.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: Or [lest] it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good."
verses.hausa: "Ko kuma (kada (ya ce: a lõkacin da yake ganin azãba, 'Dã lalle a ce inã da wata kõmawa (zuwa dũniya) dõmin in kasance daga mãsu kyautatãwa.'"

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.
verses.hausa: "Na'am! Lalle ne ãyõyiNa sun jẽ maka, sai ka ƙaryata a game da su, kuma ka yi girman kai, kuma ka kasance daga kãfirai."

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
verses.english: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah [with] their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant?
verses.hausa: Kuma a Rãnar ¡iyãma kanã ganin waɗanda suka yi ƙarya ga Allah fuskõkinsu sunã mãsu yin baƙi. Ashe bãbu mazauni a cikin Jahannama ga mãsu girman kai?

verses.arabic: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.english: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah na tsĩrar da waɗanda suka yi taƙawa a game da wurin sãmun babban rabonsu, cũta bã zã tashãfe su ba, kuma ba su zama sunã baƙin ciki ba.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
verses.english: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.
verses.hausa: Allah ne Mai halitta dukan kõme, kuma Shĩ ne Wakĩli a kan kõme.

verses.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.english: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers.
verses.hausa: Shĩ ke da mabũɗan sammai da ƙasã. Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta da ãyõyin Allah, waɗannan sũ nemãsu hasãra.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Shin, wanin Allah kuke umurni na da in bauta wa? Yã ku jãhilai!"

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
verses.english: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers."
verses.hausa: Kuma an yi wahayi zuwa gare ka da kuma zuwa ga waɗanda suke a gabãninka, "Lalle idan ka yi shirki haƙĩƙa aikinka zai ɓãci, kuma lalle zã ka kasance daga mãsu hasãra."

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
verses.english: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.
verses.hausa: Ã'aha! Ka bauta wa Allah kaɗai, kuma ka kasance daga mãsu gõdiya.

verses.arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be [within] His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba su ƙaddara Allah a kan haƙĩƙanin ĩkon yinsa ba: ¡asã duka damƙarSa ce, a Rãnar ¡iyãma, kuma sammai abũbuwan naɗewa ne ga dãmanSa. Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Shi, kuma Ya ɗaukaka daga barin abin da suke shirki da shi.

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.english: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka busa a cikin ƙaho, sai waɗanda ke a cikin sammai da ƙasã suka sũma sai wanda Allah Ya so (rashin sumansa) sa'an nan aka hũra a cikinsa, wata hũrãwa, sai gã su tsaitsaye, sunã kallo.

verses.arabic: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record [of deeds] will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged.
verses.hausa: Kuma ƙasã ta yi haske da hasken Ubangijinta, kuma aka aza littãfi, kuma aka zo da Annabãwa da mãsu shaida, kuma aka yi hukunci a tsakãninsu, da gaskiya, alhãli kuwa, sũ, bã zã a zãlunce su ba.

verses.arabic: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka cika wa kõwane rai abin da ya aikata. Kuma (Allah) Shĩ ne Mafi sani game da abin da suke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka kõra waɗanda suka kãfirta zuwa Jahannama, jama'a-jama'a har a lõkacin da suka je mata, sai aka buɗe ƙõfõfinta, kuma matsaranta suka ce musu, "Ashe, waɗansu Manzanni, daga cikinku ba su je muku ba, sunã karanta ãyõyin Ubangijinku a kanku, kuma sunã yi muku gargaɗin gamuwa da yininku wannan?" Suka ce, "Na'am, "kuma amma kalmar azãba ita ce ta wajaba a kan kãfirai!"

verses.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
verses.english: [To them] it will be said, "Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
verses.hausa: Aka ce, "Ku shiga ƙõfõfin Jahannama, kaunã madawwama a cikinta. Sa'an nan mazaunin makangara yã munana."

verses.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ
verses.english: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," [they will enter].
verses.hausa: Kuma aka kõra waɗanda suka bi Ubangijinsu da taƙawa zuwa Aljanna jama'a-jama'a har a lõkacin da suka jẽ mata, alhãli kuwa an buɗe kõfõfinta, kuma matsaranta suka ce musu, "Aminci ya tabbata a gare ku, kun ji dãɗi, sabõda haka ku shige ta, kunã madawwama (a cikinta)."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
verses.english: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth [so] we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of [righteous] workers."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah Wanda Ya yi mana gaskiya ga wa'adinSa, kuma Ya gãdar da mu ƙasã, munã zama a cikin Aljanna a inda muke so." To, madalla da ijãrar ma'aikata.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [Allah] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
verses.hausa: Kuma kanã ganin malã'iku sunã mãsu tsayãwa da haƙƙoƙin da aka ɗõra musu daga kẽwayen Al'arshi, sunã tasbĩhi game da gõde wa Ubangijinsu. Kuma aka yi hukunci a tsakãninsu da gaskiya. Kuma aka ce, "Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah, Ubangijin halittu."
